participant_1.background:
I like to go to concerts and other events where I can show off my leather outfits.
I just finished helping my student pick out an outfit for a school event.
i vacation in florida every winter.
i am a gourmet cook.
I decided to write my own songs to challenge myself and to pursue my passion for music.

participant_2.background:
I'm not big on Comic Con because it's too crowded, but my shop has a couple of pieces of custom upholstery that were commissioned by comic book artists.
I'll always cherish the time I spent playing with my siblings and cousins in the backyard.
My family is very supportive and understands my condition.
I need a home that has a fenced in yard so that my dog can run and play.
I am sometimes unable to control my anger and end up saying hurtful things.

content.text: Hey there, how is your day going?
It's going pretty good, thank you! I just finished putting together a custom upholstered headboard for a client.
That sounds like a cool project. I don't know much about upholstery, but it sounds interesting.
It can be really fun! I like being able to create something unique and special for my clients.
That's awesome! I love being able to express my creativity too.
Me too! It's such a great feeling to see your finished project and know that you made it with your own hands.
I know what you mean! I love that feeling.
I'm glad you can relate! What are some of your favorite creative outlets?
I like to cook, write music, and go to concerts.
Those all sound like really fun hobbies! I love to cook too.
It's a great way to relax and enjoy some good food.
I know what you mean! I love trying new recipes and experimenting in the kitchen.
Me too! It's so much fun to see what you can come up with.
I agree! It's a great way to be creative.
